item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

when i try to compile i get these errors:

client.java:9797: illegal start of type
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“x91”)) {
^

heres my pickup command:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x91")) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

whats wrong with that…

and my second error:

client.java:14042 identifier expected }; ^

2 errors…

any advice…?

Read full topic
